Erika is 31 years old. She normally gets up at dawn to start the household chores, prepare the food and look after her 12-year-old son: she feeds him and takes him to school. After this routine, she starts her work to earn a living: she is a third-party sewing contractor, working from her own shop at home.

She began this business and lifestyle in 2013, and it is bringing her hope and opportunity for progress. She has seen how her life is starting to improve, and is projecting a better financial future.

Her dream, and the goal when she started the business, was to improve her living conditions and be able to support her son as well as covering her own expenses at home.

Erika is requesting a loan to invest in the purchase of an overlock sewing machine and threads that will be of great help in improving production time and garment finishing.

loans.use: to purchase an overlock sewing machine and threads, in order to improve production time.

loans.name: Clemente De Jesus

texts.es: Don clemente de 50 años de edad viven casa propia con su esposa, el se dedica a realizar viajes en su carro desde hace 15 años, tiene muchos clientes que lo prefieren por la responsabilidad que tiene a la hora de manejar, con lo que obtiene de su trabajo logra solventar los gastos que se le presentan en su hogar, el está solicitando un crédito para la compra de llantas y darle mantenimiento a su vehículo ya que esa es su única fuente de trabajo y poder tener mejor calidad de vida junto con su esposa.
texts.en:
Clemente is 50 years old and lives in his own house with his wife. He has made a living making trips in his car for 15 years. He has a lot of customers who prefer him for the responsibility he has when driving. With what he obtains from his work, he manages to pay for the household costs that arise. 

He is asking for a loan to buy tires and to perform maintenance on his vehicle, now that it is his only source of work and to be able to have a better quality of life with his wife.

loans.use: to buy tires and perform maintenance on his vehicle.

loans.name: Nancy Milena

texts.es:
Namcy es una mujer de 38 años de edad, ella es casada y de su matrimonio nacieron 3 hijos dos adolescentes y un menor de edad que viven y depende de ella.

Gracias a su madre la señora Nancy oferta los servicios de hogar sustituto, fue ella quien le enseño y le heredo el negocio que atiende ahora, lo que podemos ver en la foto es quizás un negocio un poco falto de estética, pero todo lo que ha logrado lo ha hecho ella, fue quien pinto y trato de adornar para hacer un lugar más agradable para los niños, pues carece de recursos y los pocos ingresos que tiene los trata siempre de invertir en sus niños y familia.

Nancy trabaja una larga jornada de 12 horas todos los días de la semana, y en su hogar siempre trata de educar a sus niños para prepararlos para el futuro mentalizarlos que hay otra vida fuera del campo y que no sean conformista que estudien pro un futuro.

Nancy quiere solicitar un préstamo la razón es que le gustaría invertir en  unas adecuaciones para dormitorios, cambiar algunas camas y colchones que cumplieron su vida útil.

Tu puedes ayudar y apoyar a esta noble mujer que trata de que sus inquilinos gocen de una buena experiencia y tener un ambiente ideal para los niños.
texts.en: Nancy is a 38 year old woman.  She is married and has 3  children from her marriage, two teenagers and a minor who live with her and depend of her. Thanks to her mother, Mrs. Nancy offers her foster care services. It was her mom who taught her the job, and she inherited the business she works in now. What we can see in the photo  is perhaps a business with a lack of aesthetics, but everything she has, it was done by her. She painted and decorated it to make the place attractive to children, although she lacks the resources and the little income she has, she has to invest in her children and family. Nancy works a long 12 hour day,  every day of the week. At home, she always tries to educate her children to prepare them for the future, and to instill in their minds the idea that there is a life outside of the countryside, and that they should not be so conformist and that they should study for the future. Nancy wants to apply for a loan to invest in improvements for the bedrooms, change some beds and mattresses which have completed their useful lives. You can help and support this noble woman who tries to offer her tenants a good experience and an ideal environment for the kids.

loans.use: To improve the bedrooms, decoration and painting of bedrooms.

loans.name: Sanavbar

texts.ru: Санавбар 41 лет. Она жительница района Яван. Санавбар замужем и у нее двое сыновей. Сыновьям 12 и 8 лет. Они ходят в школе. Муж находится на заработках в Российской Федерации. Он каждый месяц отправляет деньги домой. Санавбар 6 лет назад научилась, кроит, и сшить женской одежды. Сейчас Санавбар помогает мужу обеспечить семьи. Она шьет женскую одежду.Ей в работе помогает ученица. Санавбар планирует, взят кредит, и за счет кредита купит утюг для одежды, чтобы гладить платье. И на оставшуюся часть денег купить швейные принадлежности. Запрашиваемый кредит поможет ей улучшить швейное дело. По этой причине Санавбар обратилась за кредитом.
texts.en: Sanavbar is 41 years old. She is a resident of the Yavan District. Sanavbar is married and has two sons. Her sons are 12 and 8 years old. They attend school. Her husband works abroad in the Russian Federation. He sends money home every month. Six years ago, Sanavbar learned to cut patterns and sew women's clothing. Now Sanavbar helps her husband provide for their family. She sews women's clothing. Her student helps her with her work. Sanavbar plans to take out a loan and use it to buy a clothes iron so that she can iron her dresses. She will use the remaining funds to buy sewing notions. She is requesting a loan to help her improve her sewing business. This is the reason why Sanavbar is requesting a loan.

loans.use: to buy an iron and to improve her work process.

loans.name: Aipara

texts.ru: Айпара, 63 года, вдова, есть дочь. У нее среднее образование, уже 20 лет занимается животноводством и полеводством, начав с суммы 10,000 сом (KGS). Благодаря упорному труду, в хозяйстве Айпары на сегодняшний день имеется 6 коров. На участке мерою 3,0 Га она выращивает горох, кукурузу. Ее ежемесячная прибыль составляет 10,000 сом (KGS), этих средств не хватает на достойную жизнь. Поэтому в целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, она обратилась в Банк «Бай –Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 50,000 сом (KGS), целью которого является покупка 5 коров. Доходы от кредита Венера планирует вложить в дальнейшее развитие своего бизнеса.
texts.en: Aipara is 63 years old, a widow and has a daughter. She has a secondary education. For 20 years, she has been practicing livestock breeding and crop farming. She started this business with 10,000 som (KGS). Thanks to Aipara's hard work, she currently has 3 cows on her farm. On a 3.0 hectare plot of land she grows peas and corn.  Her average monthly income is 10,000 som (KGS), which is not enough for a decent life. This is why, for the further development of her business, she turned to Microfinance Bank "Bai Tushum." She is requesting a loan for 50,000 som (KGS) to buy 5 cows. Aipara plans to invest the earnings from the loan in the further development of her business.

loans.use: to buy two cows to increase her income.

loans.name: San Cristobal De Aparquilla Group

texts.es:
Los socios pertenecen al banco comunal “SAN CRISTOBAL DE APARQUILLA”; Este banco se ubicada en el distrito de Anta, perteneciente a la provincia de Anta y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Juana ella es conviviente y tiene 41 años y tiene 2 hijos; La socia trabaja en su negocio de venta de cereales, la socia vende maíz, trigo y quinua, la socia trabaja desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 5:00 p.m, la socia ya tiene 4 años en este negocio y le va muy bien, el sueño de la socia es tener un local donde pueda vender los cereales. La socia solicita el crédito para comprar trigo, maíz y quinua.
 
 Los otros socios se dedican al negocio de venta de ropa, negocio de venta de zapatos, negocio de tienda de abarrotes y negocio de venta de carteras.

Las socias que estan pegados a la foto grupal se les tomo después la foto porque pidieron permiso por motivos de trabajo.



La socia agradece a quienes forman parte de este sueño mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
These people belong to the “San Cristobal De Aparquilla” communal bank. This bank is located in the district of Anta, which belongs to the province of Anta in the department of Cusco.

Juana is one of the members of the communal bank. She is 41 years old and she has a partner and two children. She has her own business, which sells grains. She sells maize, wheat, and quinoa. She works from 8:00 a.m. to 5:00 p.m. She has already had this business for four years and it is going very well for her. Her dream is to have a fixed location where she can sell her grains. She is requesting the loan in order to buy wheat, maize, and quinoa.

The other members make a living by selling clothes, shoes, groceries, and handbags.

The members whose photos are attached to the group photo asked to have their photos taken later due to work commitments.

Juana is grateful to those who are part of her dream through this platform and she is committed to making her repayments on time.

loans.use: to buy wheat, maize, and quinoa

loans.name: Maritza De Jesus

texts.es: Maritza de 42 años de edad es divorciada vive en casa propia con sus dos hijos, ella se dedica a la venta de comida, su negocio está ubicado en su lugar de residencia  desde hace 5 años, tiene muchos clientes por los buenos precios, con lo que obtiene de sus ventas logra solventar algunos gastos de su hogar, ella está solicitando un crédito para la compra de pollos, carnes, verduras, frutas, refrescos, arroz y demás ingredientes que ella necesita para continuar con sus ventas y así poder tener mejores ingresos.
texts.en: 42-year-old Maritza is divorced. She lives in her own house with her two children. She makes a living by selling food. Her business is located in her home and she has had it for five years. She has many clients due to her reasonable prices. She manages to settle some of her household expenses with the profits from her sales. She is requesting a loan so she can buy chicken, meat, vegetables, fruit, soft drinks, rice, and other ingredients that she needs in order to continue with her sales; in this way, she will be able to have a better income.

loans.use: to buy chicken, meat, vegetables, fruit, soft drinks, rice, and other ingredients

loans.name: Idalia Margarita

texts.es:
En el sitio la pila del cantón Montecristi se reúne cada quince días el Grupo De Crédito  La Pila. Este lugar es muy conocido en la provincia y en el país por su rica cultura tradicional,  se puede encontrar una gran variedad de  artesanía que son elaboradas por sus habitantes siguiendo las costumbres tradicionales.
En este lugar vive la señora Idalia, tiene 55 años de edad, está casada y de esta relación tienen dos hijos mayores de edad, una de ellos aun vive con ella. Su esposo es agricultor.
Doña Idalia es una mujer que siempre le ha gustado trabajar y con sus ganancias ayudarle a su marido con los gastos del hogar ya que el no gana mucho en el campo, ella  tiene un pequeño restaurante en su casa donde prepara deliciosos platos, trabaja de lunes a sábados con la ayuda de su hija, preparan variedad de platos para el desayuno y los almuerzos para satisfacer a sus clientes, razón por la cual día a día llegan muchas personas a servirse sus platos ya que son deliciosos, este crédito que está solicitando es para comprar cerámicas para arreglar el piso de su negocio para brindar un mejor servicio en un local más elegante y así ganar más clientela, ella agradece mucho los créditos y a las personas que la apoyan para recibirlos.
Este crédito lo va utilizar en comprar cerámicas, cemento y víveres para la preparación de los alimentos. Está en el Grupo De Crédito  desde hace 6 años  y le gusta porque con los créditos ella mejora su negocio y su vida. Sus sueños son tener un local bien elegante.
texts.en:
The “La Pila” communal bank meets every fortnight in La Pila in the canton of Montecristo. This place is very famous in the province and throughout the country for its rich traditional culture. A huge variety of handicrafts, made by the inhabitants in the traditional ways, can be found here.

Idalia lives here. She is 55 years old and married. She has two grown-up children from her marriage and one lives with her. Her husband is a farmer.

Idalia is a woman who has always liked to work and use her profits to help her husband with the household expenses since he does not earn much in the field. She has a small restaurant in her house, where she makes delicious meals. She works from Monday to Saturday with the help of her daughter. They make a variety of dishes for breakfast and lunch to satisfy their customers. Every day many people come to eat Idalia’s meals because they are delicious. She is requesting this loan so she can buy ceramic tiles to fix the floor of her business in order to offer better service in more elegant surroundings; in this way, she will attract more customers. She is very grateful for the loans and for the people who help her to receive them.

She is going to use this loan to buy ceramic tiles, supplies for making her food, and cement. She has been with this communal bank for six years and she likes it because she can improve her business and her life with the help of the loans. Her dream is to have very elegant premises for her restaurant.

loans.use: to buy ceramic tiles, cement, and food supplies

loans.name: Roberto

texts.en:
Roberto is grateful that he was granted a 50,000 PHP loan, which he used to pay for fertilizer and necessary farm inputs. Through his earnings he is able to support his family's daily basic needs. Aside from his farm he also makes and sells "butsi", a native delicacy. Butsi is a rice cake made from sweet flour that is molded into shape with a sweet bean paste filling and sesame seed coating.

Roberto would like to apply for another PHP 50,000 loan which he will use to buy more organic fertilizer for a more productive farm. He will also use part of the loan to buy ingredients for butsi. His earnings from his farm and food vending will definitely help cover his family’s daily needs. He thanks you and God in advance for the financial help.

Roberto dreams for his farm to grow and flourish. He prays that his children will lead a happy and prosperous life. He faithfully meets up with his co-fellowship members to share stories of his work every week. This is also where he can draw strength and inspiration from the Word of God he studies.

* All CCT community partners / clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital and repay Micro Finance loans.

loans.use: to pay for organic fertilizer for a productive pineapple harvest and to buy ingredients to make and sell "butsi".

loans.name: Enrica

texts.en:
Enrica is a 41-year-old married woman with one child in school. She works very hard to provide for them by running a general store in the Philippines. She has been in this business for three years.

Enrica requested a PHP 15,000 loan through NWTF to buy items to sell, such as condiments, beverages, home care products, and other groceries. In the future, Enrica would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy condiments, beverages, home care products and other groceries.

loans.name: Severtodeza

texts.en:
Severtodeza is 40 years old and married with one child. She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 7,000 loan through NWTF in order to purchase more groceries to sell.

Severtodeza has been in this business for two years and sells a variety of items, such as biscuits, candies, canned goods, and other groceries. In the future, Severtodeza would like to build and expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase more stocks of groceries to resell.

loans.name: Andrea

texts.en:
Andrea works hard to support her family. Andrea is married and has a fish vending business in the Philippines. She requested a PHP 29,500 loan through NWTF to purchase more fish to sell in her stall. Andrea has been in this business for ten years.

She successfully repaid her previous loan and is now requesting a new loan to further build her business. In the future, Andrea would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase more fish to sell in her fish stall.

loans.name: Philipo

texts.en:
Philipo is a hard-working 41-year-old married man with six children, living in Kamwenge, Uganda. He used his previous loan to buy more maize and coffee to sell. In addition to this activity, he grows bananas, cassava, and coffee to earn extra income. Philipo started this business to look after his family. He still faces a challenge of weather changes, that affect his produce business, and price fluctuations. He has a vision of finishing up his residential house.

Philipo is requesting a loan to buy more maize to sell.

loans.use: to buy more maize to sell.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy some sheep in order to increase her income.

loans.name: Sroy

texts.en:
Sroy (pictured here) is 42 years old, living in the Khsach Kandal district of Kandak province, Phnom Penh, Cambodia. She has been married since 1994 and has two sons and two daughters. One works as a staff member at a hotel, while the other three are attending school.
 
Sroy is a cleaner with two year's experiences, while her husband has been a construction worker for 11 years. She would like to apply for a loan to purchase a motorcycle to ride to her work everyday. Nowadays, she hasn’t got the means to take her to work, so everyday she spends $1.50. This is why Sroy has decided to create her own means, so that she can save the $1.50 per day everyday.

loans.use: to purchase a motorcycle so she can ride to work.

loans.name: Delia

texts.en:
Delia is 49 years old and has four children. She is married and one of her children is in school. Delia is in the agricultural business, raising pigs in the Philippines. She has requested a 15,000 PHP loan through NWTF to buy feed and other supplies to raise her livestock.

Delia has been in this business for three years now, and has borrowed nine times in the past from NWTF to sustain it. She successfully repaid her previous loan, and now she has requested another loan to further build her business. In the future, Delia would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy feed and other supplies to raise her livestock.

loans.name: Sulaiman

texts.en:
Sulaiman is a 26-year-old, hardworking married man with two children living in Kamwenge, Uganda. He deals in produce, selling maize, ground nuts and coffee as his main source of income alongside motorcycle (boda boda) transport, where he earns additional income. Sulaiman started this business to sustain his family. He still faces the challenge of weather changes that affect his produce business, since it is a seasonal kind of business and he has a lack of capital to meet the increasing demands. 

Sulaiman still has a vision of expanding his business into new markets. He is requesting a loan to buy more maize, ground nuts and coffee to sell.

loans.use: to buy more maize, ground nuts and coffee to sell.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy five sacks of fertilizer, pesticide, a bag of seed and to pay labor.

loans.name: Etini

texts.en:
Etini is 33 years old with 5 children. She runs a small business selling elei printing material at the market to earn a living. She has been doing this for more than a year. 

Etini hopes to expand her business in the future and support her children's education. To do this, Etini needs a loan to buy rolling materials, paint color, paint brush, and a container to help her run her business. She joined SPBD in 2014.

loans.use: to buy materials for her printing business.

loans.name: Teresita

texts.en:
As a married parent of eight children, Teresita works hard to support her family. She has a buy-and-sell ready-to-wear clothing business in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from her general store, and from farming sugarcane. Teresita is borrowing 9,000 PHP through NWTF to purchase more stock of ready-to-wear clothing to sell for her buy-and-sell ready-to-wear business.

Teresita has been sustaining her business activities through her past 22 loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream of saving enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase more stock of ready-to-wear clothing to sell.

loans.name: Elizabeth

texts.en:
Elizabeth is 44 years old and married with two children. She works very hard to provide for them. She runs a general store in the Philippines and has requested a 10,000 PHP loan through NWTF to purchase more groceries to sell. She has been in this business for two years, and sells a variety of items such as spices, noodles, canned goods and other groceries. 

In the future, Elizabeth would like to save enough money to expand her business and repair her family's home.

loans.use: to purchase more groceries to sell.

loans.name: Adelaida

texts.en:
Adelaida is a married woman with three children. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur. Adelaida is 53 years old and has two children who are in school.

Adelaida has a food vending business in the Philippines. Adelaida requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF to buy ingredients like condiments, etc.

Adelaida has been in this business for five years. In the future, Adelaida would like to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy ingredients like condiments

loans.name: Magsad

texts.en: Magsad is 35 years old. He is single and lives with his parents. They are living in Fuzuli region near the war zone. But Magsad’s family have been IDP  (Internally Displaced Persons) from Fuzuli city for 22 years. He has been in the animal breeding business for eight years. Today he needs a loan of 1,000 AZN (Azerbaijan New Manat) to buy hay and straw. Magsad says a great thanks to the Kiva organization and lenders for help. In the future, he wants to get married and have a big family.

loans.use: to buy hay and straw to increase business. In the future, he wants to get married and have a big family.

loans.name: Annaliza

texts.en:
Annaliza is 32 years old and married with three children.

She works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 30,000 loan through NWTF to purchase more stock to sell like canned goods, eggs, milk, sugar, etc.

Annaliza has borrowed and repaid eight loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the general store for five years and also earns an income from food vending.

She aspires to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase more stock to sell like canned goods, eggs, milk, and sugar

loans.name: Cecilia

texts.en:
Cecilia works hard to support her family. Cecilia is married and has a handicraft business in the Philippines.

Cecilia requested a PHP 12,000 loan through NWTF to buy additional materials for her business.

Cecilia has been in this business for eight years now.

Cecilia would like to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy additional materials for her business

loans.name: Angelita

texts.en:
As a married parent of four children, Angelita works hard to support her family.

She has a food vending business in the Philippines, and she also earns additional income from selling dry goods. Angelita is borrowing PHP 17,000 through NWTF to buy ingredients and materials for her food vending business.

Angelita has been sustaining her business activities through her past 11 loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy ingredients and materials for her food vending business.

loans.name: Yamileth Del Socorro

texts.es:
Yamileth tiene más de 4 años de dedicarse  a la venta de pescados y atender su pequeña pulpería, ubicada en su casa de habitación. Y gracias a los créditos obtenidos por la micro financiera Mi Crédito, ha podido  abastecerse con mercadería.  En consiguiente, sus ingresos han aumentado, convirtiendo su negocio en rentable y sólido. 
Por ello, solicita un crédito para continuar invirtiendo en la compra de pescado, granos básicos, gaseosas, meneítos, golosinas, artículos de aseo personal, etc. Esto le será de gran ayuda, porque aprovechará la temporada de verano y a la vez podrá incrementar sus ventas. Yamileth espera que su negocio se amplié y  pueda continuar invirtiendo en él.
texts.en:
Yamileth has been selling fish and looking after her small store, located in her house, for more than 4 years. Thanks to the loans obtained by the micro finance Mi Crédito, she has been able to supply herself with merchandise. As a result, her income has increased, making her business profitable and solid. 

For this reason, she is asking for a loan to continue buying fish, basic grains, soft drinks, chips, candy, personal hygiene items, etc. This will be a big help to her because she will take advantage of the summer season and at the same she will be able to increase her sales. Yamileth hopes that her business increases and she can continue to invest in it.

loans.use: to buy fish, basic grains, soft drinks, chips, candy, personal hygiene items, etc.

loans.name: Dzame

texts.en:
Dzame is a married woman with eight children, three of whom attend school. The others are grown-ups. She lives in her own house that has neither electricity nor piped water 
.
For the past three years, she has operated a retail shop selling plastic utensils at the market. She sells to all classes of people. She mentioned seasonality as a major challenge in her place of operation.

With the loan of 50,000 KES that she is requesting, she wants to purchase some plastic plates and cups for resale. She decided to join Yehu to get the loan and improve her business.

loans.use: to purchase some plastic plates and cups for resale

loans.name: Isaac's Group

texts.en:
Isaac is 46 years old and has 9 children. He is the group leader and is representing his group formed by 7 farmers in Kakamega North District, Kenya. 

Isaac has been farming with One Acre Fund for years now, having joined the program for the first time in 2011. The decision to join was largely a result of his desire to get the best quality fertilizer and hybrid seeds.  Although he described his last harvest as good, he believes he could have a better one this year by continuing to work alongside One Acre Fund. Isaac has also decided to purchase a solar light as part of his loan, which he is very excited about, as it will allow him to have an overall improved quality of life.

Obtaining this loan means that Isaac's Group will be able to receive a total of 4 solar lights, as well as farming inputs to plant a total of 4.5 acres.

loans.use: to purchase a solar light and gain access to cost efficient hybrid seeds and fertilizer for maize cultivation.

loans.name: Zumrud

texts.en:
Zumrud is 47 years old and she is married. Her husband is a labourer and they have a son and a daughter. She has been working as a seller for 10 years and her monthly income is 210 AZN. This money is very little for her to cover the family's needs. Her husband also earns little money and it's very hartd for the family to provide for themselves. 

Zumrud is a housekeeper but in order to earn money for her family, she sells women's clothing in her house. She sells different trousers, jackets, skirts, coats, etc. 

Zumrud doesn't have enough clients because the local people go to the center of the region and buy clothing there. Zumrud applied for a 1,500 AZN loan in order to use a small place in the center to sell her clothing. She will use this money to pay for the first month of rent. She hopes that her income will increase.

loans.use: to rent a place for selling and pay the rental fees

loans.name: Bernadeth

texts.en:
Bernadeth is 51 years old and has eight children. Bernadeth is married and three of her children are in school.

Bernadeth is in the agricultural business, farming rice in the Philippines. Bernadeth requested a PHP 12,000 loan through NWTF to buy fertilizers and other farm supplies.

Bernadeth has been in this business for 11 years now and has borrowed eight times in the past from NWTF to sustain it.

She successfully repaid her previous loan and now she has requested another loan to further build her businesses.

In the future, Bernadeth would like to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase fertilzers and other farm supplies

loans.name: Silver

texts.en: Silver is a married man living in Bundibugyo, Uganda. He buys and sells cocoa and has been in business for 19 years. Besides price fluctuations, seasonal weather changes and high transportation costs, he lacks adequate capital to expand the business into new markets for higher profits. Silver has requested a loan to buy more cocoa to sell.

loans.use: to buy more cocoa to sell

loans.name: George's Group

texts.en:
George is 66 years old and has seven children. He is a group leader and is representing his group of nine farmers in Kakamega North District, Kenya. 

George has been farming with One Acre Fund for years now, having joined the program for the first time in 2009. This decision was largely a result of his desire to have access to quality training and acquire new farming methods and, although he described his last harvest as good, he believes he could have a better one this year by continuing to work alongside One Acre Fund. George also decided to purchase a solar light as part of his loan, which he is very excited about, as it will allow him to have light during dark hours for his children to be able to study.

Obtaining this loan means that George's Group will be able to receive a total of five solar lights, as well as farming inputs to plant a total of 8.75 acres.

loans.use: to purchase a solar light and gain access to cost efficient hybrid seeds and fertilizer for maize cultivation.

loans.name: Benkadi Group

texts.fr:
Doussouba est la femme en photo qui tient la corde du bélier.
Doussouba est une femme malienne âgée de 30 ans. Mariée à un cultivateur, elle est mère de 4 enfants âgés de 5 à10 ans dont un (01) scolarisé. 
Doussouba n’est pas instruite. Elle fait l’embouche ovine pour gagner sa vie. Elle a une expérience de  plus de quatre (04) ans. Par manque de moyens, Doussouba fait recourt aux services financiers du RMCR dans le rêve de développer son activité en vue d’améliorer les conditions de vie et le bien-être de ses enfants. Elle s’approvisionne au marché public et revend ses moutons dans le même marché.
Avec le prêt, Doussouba achète plus de béliers et de d’aliments bétails pour ses moutons.
     Doussouba  a un bénéfice prévisionnel de 15000 FCFA.
texts.en:
Doussouba is the woman pictured holding the rope of the ram. She is a 30-year-old Malian woman, married to a farmer, and the mother of four children from five to ten years old, of whom one attends school.

Doussouba is not educated. She fattens sheep for a living, and has over four years' experience.

Due to a lack of resources, Doussouba resorts to the RMCR financial services with the dream of expanding her business to improve her children's lives and well-being. She resupplies at the public market and sells her sheep in the same market.

Doussouba will use the loan to buy more rams and feed for her sheep. She expects to attain profits of 15,000 CFA francs.

loans.use: buy rams to be resold later

loans.name: Jose Everardo

texts.es:
Everardo, de 27 años de edad, es una persona muy trabajadora, estudió hasta bachillerato, está acompañado, su pareja se dedica a los cuidados del hogar, viven junto a una tía de su pareja, pues ella vivía sola y no tenía quien le hiciera compañía.

Everardo, es empleado de una empresa que se dedica a sembrar caña de azúcar y vendérselas a los ingenios azucareros, el es encargado de dirigir el trabajo de los diferentes agricultores; También se ha dedicado a la siembra de hortalizas y granos básicos desde que era pequeño.

El préstamo solicitado es para comprar insumos agrícolas y pagar la mano de obra para sembrar 14,000 metros cuadrados de Pipian, porque este cultivo que es bien popular y rentable en la zona donde él vive.

Everardo, sueña con llegar a tener su casa propia, en donde pueda vivir junto con su pareja y sus futuros hijos, para verlos crecer y que lleguen a ser personas de bien a la sociedad.
texts.en:
Everardo, of 27 years of age, is a very hardworking person. He studied up to high school. He is with someone; his partner looks after the house. They live with his partner's aunt since she lived by herself and had no one to keep her company.   

Everardo is an employee of a company dedicated to planting sugar cane and selling it to sugar refineries. He is in charge of managing the work of the different farmers. Also, he has made a living planting vegetables and bulk grains since he was young.

The requested loan is to buy fertilizers and to pay workforce to plant 14,000 square meters of Pipián (a type of squash) since this crop is very popular and  profitable in the area where he lives.              

Everardo dreams of getting to have his own house where he could live with his partner and his future children to watch them grow and become good people to society.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and to pay workforce to plant 14,000 square meters of Pipián (a kind of squash).

loans.name: Sanabar

texts.ru: Санабар 53 года, не замужем, мать 3 детей. У нее среднее образование, в качестве основного дохода для своей семьи занимается животноводством и полеводством. Благодаря упорному труду Санабар, в ее хозяйстве на сегодняшний день имеется 2 коровы, на участке мерою 0,44 Га собственной земли она выращивает лук. Также Санабар выращивает черешни, яблони, персики и сливы для продажи плодов и молодых саженцев. Ежемесячный доход составляет 12,000 сом (KGS). В целях дальнейшего развития своего дела, Санабар обратилась в Банк «Бай –Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 50,000 сом (KGS) на покупку удобрений для сада и 6 кг. семян лука. Доходы от кредита Санабар планирует вложить в дальнейшее приумножение ее бизнеса.
texts.en:
Sanabar is 53, unmarried, and a mother of three children.  She has a secondary school education and works as a crop and livestock farmer to provide the main source of income for her family.  Thanks to Sanabar's persistence, she currently has 2 cows on her farm and a 0.44-hectare plot of her own land for growing onions.  Sanabar also grows cherries, apples, peaches and plums for sale as cash crops and for transplants.  Her monthly income is 12,000 som.  

For the future development of her business, Sanabar has requested a loan of 50,000 som from Bai Tushum Bank to buy fertilizer for sowing and 6 kg of onion seeds.  She plans on using her extra income due to the loan to invest in the future expansion of her business.

loans.use: buy fertilizer for her garden and 6 kg of onion seeds

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to invest in: brick, cement, sand, gravel and iron to build tiered access to her home.

loans.name: Jovanska

texts.es: Jovanska is a single woman and she lives with her parents Jovanska is a experienced baby sitter she also studied especial education she takes care of babies Jovanska works since 8:00 am to 19:00 Jovanska needs a loan to pay an education class because she wants to get a job at a child care center where she can get more money She hopes you can help her because Jovanska is the only at her house that has a job and regular incomes
texts.en: Jovanska is a single woman who lives with her parents. She is an experienced babysitter, and she also studied special education. She works as a nanny from 8 a.m. to 7 p.m. Jovanska needs a loan to pay for an education class because she wants to get a job at a child-care center where she can earn more money. She hopes you can help her because she is the only one in her house who has a job and earns regular income.

loans.use: to pay for an education class

loans.name: Rosa Julia

texts.es:
Rosa, de 30 años de edad, estudio hasta noveno grado, no siguió estudiando porque solo se creció con su mamá y ella no tuvo los recursos económicos para seguir ayudándole a su hija; está casada y su esposo es agricultor y tiene un hijo  de dos años de edad.

Rosa, vende comida típica desde hace 5 años, ya que lo aprendió de su abuela, a ella desde pequeña la mandaban a vender tamales, atol, frescos y más, pero desde hace 5 años su negocio es propio, ella sale a vender sus alimentos a pie por todo el cantón, su horario no es fijo, ella comienza su jornada laboral desde las 10:00 a.m. porque a las 2:00 p.m. sale con su canasto a vender casa por casa y regresa a las 5:00 p.m. ella hace esta actividad con mucho gusto, pues de esta forma le ayuda a su esposo en los gastos de su hogar.

El crédito será invertido para arreglar la galera donde cocina, comprará madera, lámina y el resto del dinero lo invertirá en comprar los vegetales y todos los insumos que necesita para hacer sus platillos típicos. 

Sus sueños son, ayudarle a su hijo para que culmine una carrera universitaria y terminar de arreglar su casa ya que le falta el piso y repellar las paredes.
texts.en: Rosa, 30, has a ninth-grade education. She couldn't continue her studies because she lived with a single mom who did not have the economic resources to further help her daughter. Rosa is married and her husband is farmer, and they have a 2-year-old son. Rosa has sold traditional foods for the past five years, a trade she learned from her grandmother. Since Rosa was little she was sent out to sell tamales, refreshments and other items, but five years ago she started her own business. She sells her food on foot throughout her village. Her schedule isn't fixed, but she begins her workday at 10 a.m. and at 2 p.m. she goes out with her basket to sell door to door until she returns at 5. Rosa takes a lot of pleasure in this activity because in this way she can help her husband with household expenses. She plans to use the loan to fix the area where she cooks by purchasing wood and sheeting, and she will invest the rest into her business by purchasing vegetables and all the ingredients she needs to make her traditional meals. Her dreams are to help her son so he can graduate from college and to finish fixing her home, which lacks a floor and plaster on the walls.

loans.use: to fix the area where she cooks by purchasing wood and sheeting, and she will invest the rest into ingredients for her business.

loans.name: Gerardo

texts.es: Don Gerardo tiene un pequeño negocio de restaurante, es un poco viejo y necesita de mantenimiento, por lo que necesita comprar pintura para arreglarlo así como una nueva cocina con la cual preparar los alimentos. Él es un joven que siempre le ha gustado salir adelante y que su negocio le de la suficiente para vivir. Es por esto que el solicita un préstamo de un millón cien mil colones (1.100.000) para comprar lo necesario para hacer crecer su restaurante.
texts.en: Gerardo has a small restaurant business. It's a little old and needs maintenance, so he needs to buy paint to update it as well as a new kitchen to prepare his meals. He is a young man who always enjoys getting ahead and having a business that can provide him enough to live. It's for this reason he is requesting the loan to purchase what's necessary to make his restaurant grow.

loans.use: to purchase utensils and furniture for the restaurant

loans.name: Tiessiri Group

texts.fr:
Kadiatou  est la femme  à gauche  attrapant la corde attaché  au mouton  . 
Kadiatou  est une Malienne, âgée de 40 ans  mariée, mère de 04 enfants dont l’aine à18 ans tous sont scolarisés, et son époux  fait le maraichage  pour subvenir au bien être de la famille .Elle n’est pas alphabétisée   car elle n’a pas   eu la  chance d’aller  à l’école.  
Kadiatou est une éleveuse de moutons dévoué dans son travail  et suite à l’ insuffisance de l’argent qu’elle  a  fait recourt à L’IMF pour avoir plus de fonds pour pourvoir générer du profit de son activité et  pouvoir acheter plus moutons pour le développement de son activité .
Kadiatou à un rêve préférentiel pour le développement de son activité que l’aide apporte par l’IMF soit continuel
Elle s’approvisionne dans les foires de la localité et aux termes de son activité elle les revend dans les mêmes foires locales. Elle  est souvent confronté à quelques obstacles sur le marché telque la chute des    prix. 
Kadiatou réalise un bénéfice prévisionnel de 20000f par tête et par  cycle de prêt
texts.en:
Kadiatou is the woman holding the rope attached to the sheep.

Kadiatou is a 40-year-old Malian, married with four children, all attending school, and the eldest of whom is 18. Her husband is a crop gardener to support the family's well-being. She is illiterate because she did not have the opportunity to go to school.

Kadiatou is a sheep breeder dedicated to her work. Due to insufficient funds she is calling upon the MFI to provide more funds to have her business generate profit, so she can buy more sheep and further develop her business.

Kadiatou's hope is for continuing support from the MFI in developing her business activity.

She restocks at local fairs and after fattening resells in the same local fairs. She is often confronted with some market-related obstacles such as falling prices.

Kadiatou is hoping to achieve profits of 20,000 francs a head per loan cycle.

loans.use: buy sheep to be sold later

loans.name: Gulnara

texts.ru: Гулнара, 52 года, замужем, вместе с мужем воспитывают 4 детей. У нее высшее образование, с 2005 года занимается торговлей продуктами питания в собственном магазине. Дополнительно ведет полеводческую и животноводческую деятельность. На сегодняшний день у Гулнары имеется 5,0 ГА собственного земельного надела, на котором она ежегодно выращивает люцерну для внутрихозяйственного потребления и реализации. Также содержит в хозяйстве 20 коров и 15 овец.   В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, Гулнара обратилась в Банк "Бай-Тушум" за кредитом в сумме 150,000 сом (KGS) для увеличения товарооборота в магазине. Доходы от кредита Гулнара хочет вложить в образование ее младших детей.
texts.en: Gulnara is 52 years old and married.  She and her husband are raising four children.  Gulnara has a college degree.  Since 2005, she has been selling food products in her own shop.  In addition, she is involved in crop farming and animal husbandry.  She currently has five hectares of her own land and she grows alfalfa annually for farm use and resale.  She also has 20 cows and 15 sheep on her farm.  In order to further grow her business, Gulnara has turned to Bai Tushum Bank CJSC and requested a loan of 150,000 som (KGS) to increase her turnover of goods in her shop.  She is planning to use the earnings from her loan to invest in the education of her younger children.

loans.use: to buy food to be sold on a retail basis in her shop.

loans.name: Tinatin

texts.ru: Тинатин 36 лет, не замужем, есть сын. Образование у среднее, она 5 лет занимается сельским хозяйством. В хозяйстве есть 2 коровы. Доход семьи составляет до 15,000 (KGS) в месяц. Этих средств ей с сыном не хватает на достойную жизнь. Поэтому Тинатин решила развить свою деятельность и увеличить доходы, обратившись в Банк «Бай - Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 50,000 сом (KGS) на покупку бычков. Тинатин является участником группы "Кызыл Арык", в которой кроме нее состоят еще 3 человека. Прибыль от кредита позволит улучшить благосостояние семьи.
texts.en: Tinatin is 36 years old, single, and she has a son.  She has a secondary education and has been involved in agriculture for five years.  She has two cows on her farm.  Her family's income amounts to 15,000 som (KGS) per month, which is not enough for Tinatin and her son to have a decent life.  For this reason, and having decided to expand her activity and increase her income, Tinatin has turned to Bai Tushum Bank CJSC and requested a loan of 50,000 som (KGS) to buy steers.  Tinatin is a member of the "Kyzyl Aryk" group which comprises another three people, so a total of four members.  The earnings from her loan will allow her to improve her family's well-being.

loans.use: to buy some steers in order to increase her income.

loans.name: Toktokan

texts.ru: Токтокан 56 лет, вдова, есть 6 детей. Образование у Токтокан среднее, она 20 лет занимается сельским хозяйством. В хозяйстве Токтокан есть 3 коровы, на 5,77 Га земли она выращивает клевер. Доход Токтокан составляет от 10,000 (KGS) в месяц. Этих средств не хватает на достойную жизнь ее семьи, поэтому Токтокан решила развить свою деятельность и увеличить доходы, обратившись в Банк «Бай - Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 50,000 сом (KGS) на покупку бычков. Токтокан является лидером группы "Кызыл Арык", всего в группе 4 человека. Прибыль от кредита позволит улучшить благосостояние ее семьи и дальше развивать ее дело.
texts.en: Toktokan is 56 years old and the widowed mother of six children.  She has a secondary education and has been involved in agriculture for 20 years.  She has three cows on her farm and she grows clover of 5.77 hectares of land.  She makes a monthly income of 10,000 som (KGS), which is not enough for her family to have a decent life.  For this reason, Toktokan has decided to expand her activity and increase her income.  She has therefore turned to Bai Tushum Bank CJSC and requested a loan of 50,000 som (KGS) to buy a few steers.  Toktokan is the leader of the "Kyzyl Aryk" group which consists of a total of four people.  The earnings from her loan will help her to improve her family's well-being and further grow her business.

loans.use: to buy additional steers in order to increase her income.

loans.name: Agustín

texts.es:
Agustín es un hombre de 24 años de edad, está casado tiene una linda familia de dos hijos de las edades entre seis y dos años, viven en una comunidad de santo tomas la unión.
Él es un hombre amable y sincero, que trabaja como jornalero en una finca desde hace cuatro años, el realiza esta actividad con el afán de obtener ingresos y mantener a su familia.
Agustín ahora tiene la necesidad  de construir su propia casa, pero una de las dificultades que él tiene, es que no cuenta con un terreno donde pueda construir, entonces ahora se ve  la necesidad de comparar un terreno, por  tal motivo solicita el un préstamo que lo utilizara para comprar su terreno.
El anhelo de Agustín es poder conseguir  el préstamo para poder construir su casa para que sus hijos tengan una casa más digna.
texts.en:
Agustín is a 24 year old man. He is married and has a beautiful family with two children between the ages of two and six.  They live in the community of Santo Tomas la Unión.

He is a kind and sincere man who has worked as a day laborer on an estate for four years. He does this work with the desire to earn an income and to maintain his family.

Agustín now needs to build his own home but one of the difficulties that he has is that he does not have land that he can build on. Now he has the need to buy land which is the reason why he is requesting a loan that he will use to buy his land.

Agustín’s desire is to be able to get a loan in order to build his house so that his children can have a more worthy home.

loans.use: to buy land for future construction.

loans.name: San Jerónimo Group

texts.es: San Jerónimo es un grupo solidario integrado por dos mujeres y un varón que se solicitan por segundo ciclo el financiamiento en ADIM para incrementar el capital de trabajo de sus negocios, es coordinado por Norlando un hombre de 29 años de edad y padre de un hijo de la edad de tres años, quien ha sido su mayor motivación para seguir superándose se dedica a la comercialización de ropa en su domicilio, cuenta con la ayuda de su compañera de vida para la compra y comercialización de la mercadería, el crédito actual lo solicita para la compra de camisetas, pantalones, blusas, ropa interior y esta vez incrementar la venta de calzado deportivo, con el crédito anterior logró diversificar los productos ofrecidos. Los demás integrantes son Luis un joven que tiene la edad de 22 años y se dedica a la reparación de equipo e instrumentos en su domicilio desde hace dos años, y la señora Ana una mujer laboriosa que a sus 59 años comercializa leña, repostería y platanitos, esto en su domicilio.
texts.en:
"San Jerónimo" is a solidarity group made up of two women and a man who are asking for a second cycle of loans from ADIM in order to increase the amount they earn from their businesses. 

Norlando is the group's coordinator. He is a 29 year-old man and a father to a three-year old child who has been his main motivation to carry on moving forward. He sells colothing from his home and relies on the support of his life partner in order to buy merchandise. The loan that he his currently asking for is to buy t-shirts, trousers, blouses, underwear and to increase sales of sports footwear. With the previous loan he managed to offer a wider range of products. 

The other members are Luis a young 22 year-old who has been repairing equipment and instruments from home for two years and Ana who is a hardworking 59 year-old woman who sells firewood, pastries and bananas from her home.

loans.use: to buy t-shirts, trousers, blouses, underwear and to increase sales of sports footwear.

loans.name: Herlinda

texts.es:
Herlinda tiene 44 años de edad, es casada, tiene 2 hijos y vive con su familia en el distrito de Cayalti, una comunidad que se dedica a la agricultura, comercio y crianza de animales, se encuentra ubicada en la provincia de Chiclayo, región Lambayeque, en la costa norte de Perú.

Ella se dedica desde hace 5 años a la crianza y venta de animales menores. Los alimenta, los cría y engorda y una vez que ya están en un peso y tamaño ideal los vende a los comerciantes y el mercado de la zona. Herlinda junto con su esposo trabajan arduamente día a día para que con sus ingresos puedan darle lo mejor a su familia. El préstamo será utilizado para la compra de una mayor cantidad de animales como pollos, gallinas, cerdos, entre otros para incrementar el stock de su negocio, con esto ella espera ofrecer una mayor cantidad de animales a sus clientes lo que le permitirá incrementar sus ingresos y por ende mejorar su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Herlinda is 44 years old, married, has two children and lives with her family in the Cayalti district. It is a community that works in agriculture, trade and raising animals. It is located in the Chiclayo province of the Lambayeque region on the northern coast of Peru.

She has worked raising and selling small animals for 5 years. She feeds, cares for and fattens them and once they are an ideal weight and size, she sells them to the merchants at the market in the area. 

Herlinda, along with her husband, work very hard every day so that they can give the best to their family with their earnings. The loan will be used to buy wholesale animals, such as chickens, hens and pigs, among others, to increase her business’ stock. With this, she hopes to offer a greater quantity of animals to her customers which will allow her to increase her earnings and in the end, improve her quality of life and that of her family.

loans.use: to purchase animals for later sale.

loans.name: Marta

texts.es:
Marta, de 58 años de edad, solo estudio hasta primer grado, está acompañada y su pareja se dedica a la agricultura. 

Marta, siempre se ha dedicado a la siembra de maíz y frijol, como también al ganado, tiene 15 años de dedicarse a esta actividad, decidió hacerlo porque sus padres eso hacían para mantener la familia, su parcela está a 15 minutos de su casa y su pareja es quien le ayuda.


Marta, necesita el crédito para comprar insumos agrícolas para sembrar, porque ya se acerca la época y tiene que estar preparado para abonar la tierra.

Marta, siempre ha soñado tener una vivienda digna, para sus hijos.
texts.en:
Marta, 58 years old, only studied until the first grade. She is married and her partner works in agriculture. 

Marta has always worked growing corn and beans as well as with cattle. She has worked in this business for 15 years. She decided to do this because this is what her parents did to support the family. Her plot is 15 minutes from her home and her partner is the one who helps her.

Marta needs the loan to buy agricultural supplies for planting because the season is approaching and she has to be ready to fertilize the soil.

Marta has always dreamed of having a decent home for her children.

loans.use: to buy agricultural supplies for planting.

loans.name: Olivia

texts.pt:
Nasceu em Maputo tem 39 anos de idade, viúva mãe de 4 filhos apenas 1 é maior de idade e 3 frequentam a escola. Responsabiliza-se pelos seus sobrinhos que vivem em sua casa.
 É costureira a mais de 7 anos onde ganha um valor que aplica nas despesas da sua casa. A fim de dar continuidade a sua obra de residência solicita o seu 1º empréstimo na Hluvuku para adquirir material de construção como: areia, cimento, pedras e mais.
Futuramente pretende terminar a sua casa, garantir o ensino dos seus filhos até ao nível superior. O seu maior desafio é expandir mas no seu negócio de costura.
texts.en:
Olivia was born in Maputo. She is 39 years old and a widow. She has four children, one of whom is adult and three of whom are still in school. She also takes care of her nephews, who live with her.
She has been working as a seamstress for more than seven years. She uses her earnings to cover household expenses. With the goal of continuing the work on her home, she is requesting her first loan from Hluvuku to purchase construction materials such as sand, cement, and stone.
In the future she plans to finish building her house and pay for her children's education. Her dream is to expand her dressmaking business.

loans.use: to purchase construction materials such as sand, cement, and stone.

loans.name: Leopoldina

texts.pt:
Nasceu em Inhambane tem 40 anos de idade, viúva mãe de 6 filhos que frequentam a escola, não responsabiliza-se por ninguém.
Trabalha  como auxiliar a mais de 4 anos onde aufere um valor que aplica nas despesas da sua casa, começou a trabalhar com a Hluvuku em 2010. Pois enfrentando dificuldades para dar continuidade a obra da sua residência solícita um empréstimo para adquirir material de construção como: areia, cimento, blocos e mais. Este é o seu 5º empréstimo na Hluvuku.
Futuramente pretende concluir a sua  residência para dar conforto a sua família e ampliar o seu negócio de venda de produtos de beleza. O seu maior desafio é garantir o ensino dos seus filhos até ao nível superior.
texts.en:
Leopoldina was born in Inhambane. She is 40 years old and a widow, with six young children who are all in school. She is not financially responsible for anyone else.
She has been working as an assistant for more than four years and uses her earnings to pay for household expenses. She started working with Hluvuku in 2010. She is having trouble finishing the work on her home, so she is requesting a loan to purchase construction materials such as sand, cement, cinder blocks, and so on. This is her fifth loan from Hluvuku.
In the future she plans to finish building her home, offering her family a more comfortable life, and to expand her business selling beauty products. Her biggest task is to make sure her children are able to pursue their education.

loans.use: to purchase construction materials such as sand, cement, and cinder blocks.

loans.name: Celestina

texts.pt:
Nasceu em Namaacha província de Maputo tem 24 anos de idade, solteira mãe de 2 filhos menores de idade, todos frequentam a escola, responsabiliza-se pelos seus irmãos que vivem em sua casa.
Trabalha na empresa Águas de Namaacha a mais de 4 anos onde aufere um valor que aplica nas despesas da sua casa. Começou a trabalhar com a Hluvuku em 2013, pois com a insuficiência do fundo solicita um empréstimo para dar continuidade a sua obra de residência adquirindo material de construção como: areia, cimento, chapas e varões. Este é o seu 3º empréstimo na Hluvuku.
Futuramente pretende terminar a sua residência e garantir o ensino das suas filhas assim como dos seus irmãos até ao nível superior
texts.en:
Celestina was born in Namaacha in the province of Maputo. She is 24 years old and unmarried. She has two young children who are both in school, and she also takes care of her siblings, who live with her.
She has worked at the Namaacha water company for more than 4 years, and she uses her salary to cover household expenses. She started working with Hluvuku in 2013. She lacks capital of her own, so she is requesting a loan so that she can continue working on her house, purchasing construction materials such as sand, cement, sheet metal, and rebar. This is her third loan from Hluvuku.
In the future she plans to finish her home and pay for the education of her daughters and siblings.

loans.use: to purchase construction materials such as sand, cement, sheet metal, and rebar.

loans.name: Auxiliadora Del Socorro

texts.es: Auxiladora es una clienta de 49 años de edad, tiene una pulpería en su domicilio, con veintitrés años de experiencia en la administración de tal negocio, es un negocio familiar donde sus hijos se involucran en la atención hacia los clientes que llegan a comprar los productos que ofrece como granos básicos, bebidas, lácteos, etc., este negocio lo impulsó con prestamos en otras entidad financiera y desea seguir aumentando el capital del negocio por lo que solicita el crédito en ADIM y comprar granos básicos como es arroz, frijoles, azucar, aceite, leche, gaseosas, chivería, etc., se ha propuesto aumentar el capital de su negocio para mantener su familia, pues asegura que estando soltera, puede lograr equilibrar su vida con el trabajo y su familia.
texts.en:
Auxiliadora is 49 years old. She has a grocery shop in her home and has 23 years’ experience managing this business. It is a family business. Auxiliadora’s children help serve customers who come to buy products such as basic grains, drinks and dairy products. 

Auxiliadora started the business with loans from another financial institution. She wants to continue increasing capital at her business and is therefore applying for a loan from ADIM in order to buy staple goods such as rice, beans, sugar, oil, milk, fizzy drinks, dairy products and more. Auxiliadora wants to increase stock at her business in order to support her family. As a single mother, Auxiliadora wants to have a good work-life balance.

loans.use: to buy staple goods.

loans.name: Regina

texts.pt:
Nasceu em Magude Província de Maputo tem 38 anos de idade, solteira mãe de 2 filhos menores de idade, apenas 1 frequentam a escola, responsabiliza-se pela sua mãe que não vive com ela.
Trabalha no Ministério da Educação como Auxiliar a mais de 8 anos onde aufere um valor que aplica nas despesas de sua casa. Sra  Regina começou a trabalhar com a Hluvuku em 2012, pois com o fundo próprios não conseguia erguer a sua residência. Já trabalhando com a Hluvuku conseguiu adquirir um espaço e erguer a sua residência. A fim de mobilar  sua casa solícita um empréstimo para adquirir uma cama. Este é o seu 4º empréstimo na Hluvuku.
Futuramente pretende terminar a sua obra de residência e garantir o ensino das suas filhas até ao nível superior.
texts.en:
Regina was born in Magude in the province of Maputo. She is 38 years old and unmarried. She has two young children, only one of whom is of school age. She is also financially responsible for her mother, who does not live with her.
She has been working for the ministry of education for more than eight years. She uses her earnings to pay for household expenses. Regina started working with Hluvuku in 2012 because she lacked the funds to build her own home. Through working with Hluvuku, she has been able to buy a plot of land and build her house. To furnish her home, she is requesting a loan so she can purchase a bed. This is her fourth loan from Hluvuku.
In the future she intends to finish building her home and be able to pay for her daughters' education.

loans.use: to buy a bed.

loans.name: Evelina

texts.es:
Evelina tiene 32 años de edad, de estado civil conviviente, tiene 1 hijo, vive en casa familiar en una zona rural en el distrito de Oyotún que se encuentra ubicado en la provincia de Chiclayo, región Lambayeque, en la costa norte de Perú. La vida en este distrito se desarrolla tranquilamente, los pobladores se dedican principalmente a la agricultura y crianza de animales.

Ella se dedica a la venta de productos de belleza y ropa para damas, caballeros y niños, se dedica a este negocio desde hace 15 años y cuenta con clientes fijos quienes dan buenas referencias personales y laborales de ella. Solicita préstamo para la compra de una mayor cantidad de perfumes, colonias y ropa para incrementar el stock de su negocio, con esto Evelina espera satifacer las necesidades de sus clientes lo que incrementará su nivel de ventas y sus ingresos y por ende va a mejorar su calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Evelina is 32 years old and has a live-in partner. She has one son and lives in her family home in the Oyotún rural district in the Chiclayo province, Lambayeque region, on Peru’s northern coast. Here, life is peaceful and the locals work mainly in farming and raising animals.

Evelina herself has been making a living selling beauty products and clothes for men, women and children for 15 years. She has regular customers who provide good personal and professional references. Evelina is applying for this loan in order to buy more perfumes, colognes and clothes to increase stock at her business. Evelina hopes that this loan will allow her to satisfy customers’ needs, thus increasing sales and Evelina’s income. In turn, this will translate to a higher quality of life.

loans.use: to buy more perfumes, colognes and clothes to increase stock at her business.

loans.name: Miguel Angel

texts.es:
Miguel Ángel vive en Santo Domingo de los Tsachilas ciudad de la región costa, con un clima agradable. Es una ciudad muy comercial la misma que es considerada puerto terrestre que une a la sierra y a la costa. Miguel vive solo en casa de familiares, pero cerca de él también vive una hija. El a pesar de su edad trabaja mucho, los martes y jueves visita a las ferias de ganado de la ciudad, compra chanchos en fincas y los va a vender en las ferias, gracias a este negocio él ha podido seguir adelante y darles la educación a sus hijos, ya que dedica mucho años a este negocio,  también los fines de semana vende colas y aguas en la cancha de su sector.
Miguel Ángel con este crédito podrá capitalizarse para incrementar su negocio, con él comprará más chanchitos y poder crecer también en el negocio de la venta de las aguas y colas. Se siente feliz porque la Fundación ha podido tramitarle el crédito que necesita.
Agradece a Kiva por cumplir su sueño, desea seguir creciendo.
texts.en:
Miguel Ángel lives in Santo Domingo de las Tsachilas, a city in the coastal region with a comfortable climate. It is a very commercial city which is considered an inland port that unites the mountain range with the coast. Miguel lives alone in a family member’s home but a daughter also lives nearby. 

He works a lot in spite of his age. He goes to the city’s cattle market on Tuesday and Thursday. He buys pigs from farms and goes to sell them at the markets. Thanks to this work he has been able to get ahead and to give his children an education since he has worked in this business for many years. On the weekends he also sells sodas and water at the field in his area. 

With this loan, Miguel Ángel will be able to get capital for expanding his business. With it he will buy more young pigs and also be able to grow his business selling water and sodas. 

He is happy because the Foundation has been able to process the loan he needs. He thanks Kiva for fulfilling his dream and wishes to continue growing.

loans.use: to buy more pigs.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy a printer and some decorating supplies.

loans.name: Señor Pan De Azucar De Sacllo Group

texts.es:
Los socios pertenecen al banco comunal “SEÑOR PAN DE AZUCAR DE SACLLO”; Este banco se ubicada en el distrito de Calca, perteneciente a la provincia de Calca y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Teresa ella es soltera y tiene 36 años; La socia trabaja en su negocio de cultivo de frutas, la socia tiene un terreno donde cultiva plátanos, café, mandarinas y naranjas, la socia trabaja desde las 6:00 a.m hasta las 5:00 p.m, la socia ya tiene varios años en este negocio y le va muy bien, el sueño de la socia es ampliar su terreno de cultivo. La socia solicita le crédito para comprar semillas y fertilizantes.

Los otros socios se dedican al negocio de venta de animales, negocio de venta de ropa, negocio de tienda de abarrotes y negocio de venta de comida.



La socia agradece a quienes forman parte de este sueño mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
These members belong to the Señor Pan de Azucar de Sacllo communal bank, which is located in the district and province of Calca, department of Cusco.

Teresa is 36 years old and single. Her business is fruit farming, she has a plot of land where she grows bananas, coffee, tangerines and oranges. Her work day is from 6 am to 5 pm.

She's had this business for several years and she is doing very well, her dream is to expand her farmland. She is requesting a loan to buy seeds and fertilizers.

The other group members have businesses that include animal sales, clothing sales, a grocery store, and food sales.

Teresa is grateful to those who are helping her along in her dream through this assistance, and she promises to meet her payments on schedule.

loans.use: to buy seeds and fertilizers.

loans.name: Jiguène Bakhna 103 Group

texts.fr: Jiguène Bakhna 103 est un sous groupe de l'Association des Femmes Actives et Commerçantes de Pout(commune qui est à 20 km de la ville de Dakar et ou le commerce et le maraîchage sont les activités les plus pratiqués). Il est composé de 3 femmes et 2 hommes qui sont tous dans la marché de la localité et qui vendent des produits différents. Ils se voient chaque jour et ont prient leur destin en main. Ils organisent des tontines et discutent du devenir de leur quartier après le marché. Madame Safiétou est  nommé présidente de ce sous groupe et est reconnue sur la photo par la main levée. Elle est mariée et mère de famille qui évolue dans la commercialisation des pates d'arachides et de l'huile de palme.Elle a une expérience de plus de 10 ans. Elle demande ce crédit pour acheter des arachides pour les transformer en pates qu'elle revend au marché, elle achète aussi de l'huile de palme qui est très prisé dans cette localité. Elle souhaite élargir son commerce en diversifiant ses produits et pourquoi pas exporter la pâte dans la sous région.
texts.en: Jiguène Bakhna 103 is a sub group of the Association of Femmes Actives and Commerçantes of Pout (a commune 20 kilometres from Dakar and where commerce and market gardening are the most popular activities). It is made up of three women and two men who all work at the local market and who sell different products. They see each other every day and have taken their destiny in hand. They organise savings groups, and discuss the future of their district after the market. Mrs. Safiétou is the president of this sub group, she can be recognized as the person with her hand raised in the photo. She is married with children and she works in the trade of peanut paste and palm oil. She has over 10 years experience. She requests this credit to buy peanuts to transform into paste that she sells at the market, she also buys palm oil that is very popular in this locality. She hopes to expand her business by diversifying her products and maybe even exporting the paste farther afield to the sub region.

loans.use: To buy peanut paste and palm oil for resale at the market.

loans.name: Jiguène Bakhna 102 Group

texts.fr: Jiguène Bakhna 102 est un sous groupe de l'Association des Femmes Actives et Commerçantes de Pout(localité qui est à 20 km de la ville de Dakar). On y pratique le commerce de fruits et légumes et le maraîchage. Le groupe est composé de 5 femmes qui sont tous dans le marché et sont cote à cote sur les étales. Elles organisent chaque jour des tontines et attendent la fin du mois pour reverser le tout à l'Association. Leur présidente s'appelle Sokhna, c'est elle qui a levé la main sur la photo. Elle a une expérience de plus de 5 ans et demande ce montant pour renforcer ses marchandises en achetant des fruits comme le banane, les oranges, les pommes et des légumes comme le choux; les carottes et les aubergines. Elle aide son mari dans la gestion des dépenses quotidiennes et les frais de scolarité de ses enfants. Elle commence sa journée à 6h pour la terminer à 21h. Elle souhaite avec les revenus de son activité acheter un frigo pour la conservation de son stock.
texts.en: Jiguène Bakhna 102 is a sub group of the Association of Femmes Actives and Commerçantes of Pout (a commune 20 kilometres from Dakar). The commerce of fruit and vegetables and market gardening are popular there. The group is made up of five women who all work at the market and who have neighbouring stalls. Every day they organise savings groups, and they wait for the end of the month to pay everything to the Association. Their president is called Sokhna. She is the person with her hand raised in the photo. She has over five years experience and she requests this credit to reinforce her stock by purchasing fruit such as bananas, oranges, apples, and vegetables such as cabbage, carrots, and aubergines. She helps her husband to manage the daily expenses and school fees for their children. She starts her day at 0600 and finishes work at 2100. With the income from her business, she hopes to buy a refrigerator to conserve her stock.

loans.use: To buy fruit and vegetables for resale.

loans.name: Benkadi Group

texts.fr:
Sidi est l’homme qui est au milieu tenant dans ses mains le sac de sel sur la photo.
Sidi est un Malien, âgée de 41 ans, marié, père de 04 enfants dont l’ainé  a 12 ans dont les 04 sont tous scolarises, et son conjoint est une femme courageuse dans son activité qui n’est que autre choses que le petit commerce, Sidi est analphabète donc il n’a pas eu une chance d’aller à l’école.
Sidi est un  homme courageux et ambitieux dans son travail. Il vend du sel et du ciment , n’ayant pas assez de moyen pour développer son activité de  commerce ( ciment et sel) il fait recourt à L’IMF pour acheter des sacs de sel et de ciment pour revendre. Il s’approvisionne dans les foires de la localité et après approvisionnement il effectue la distribution de ses marchandises dans les différents foires de la localité ;il peut réaliser un bénéfice prévisionnel de 70000f par mois .
Le bénéfice lui permet de subvenir aux besoins de la famille tel que : la scolarisation des enfants, la sante.
texts.en:
Sidi is the man standing in the middle of the photo holding a sac of salt. He is Malian, 41 years old, married, and a father of four children. His eldest child is 12 years old, and four of the children go to school. His wife is a strong woman who works in small-scale commerce. Sidi cannot read because he didn't have the chance to go to school. 

Sidi is a courageous man and is ambitious with his work. He sells salt and cement. Because he does not have the means to develop his business, he joined the micro-finance institution so he could buy bags of salt and cement to resell. He procures his goods from the local market fairs and then makes his sales from different local market fairs. 

Sidi can earn a projected 70,000 francs each month. These earnings will allow him to support his family's needs, especially his children's school and health needs.

loans.use: to buy sacs of cement to resell

loans.name: Gilberth

texts.es: Don Gilberth tiene una pequeña panadería, sin embargo el necesita aumentar su negocio por lo que necesita comprar un horno mas grande y de mayor potencia que le ayude a producir mas. a el le encanta la reposteria y tiene buenos clientes que le van a comprar en mayor cantidad por lo que actualmente no cumple con la demanda. El necesita de un préstamo de un millón de colones para poder comprar el horno y así mejorar su negocio.
texts.en: Gilberth has a small bakery, but he needs to expand his business.  For this reason, he wants to purchase a larger, more powerful over so that he can increase his production.  He loves pastries and he has great customers who want to purchase in large quantities but he just can't meet their demand.  He needs this loan in order to purchase an oven and improve his business.

loans.use: purchase a bread oven.

loans.name: Phary

texts.en:
Phary (shown in photo) is 28 years old, and lives in the Khsach Kandal district, Kandal province, Cambodia. She has been married since 2006. She has one son and one daughter. They are still young.

Phary has been a weaver for 11 years, while her husband has been a motor taxi driver for 10 years. 

She is applying for a loan to buy silk to support her weaving sales business. She wants increase her income to support her family.

loans.use: To buy silk to support her weaving

loans.name: María

texts.es: Doña María es ama de casa, ella tiene un pequeño taller de costura. Con el cuál ha podido sacar adelante a su familia. Actualmente tiene una mayor demanda de costuras por lo que necesita comprar una maquina de coser mas grande y que le permite mejorar sus productos y así aumentar las ganancias. Ella espera salir adelante como lo ha hecho hasta ahora con su pequeño taller de costura.
texts.en: Maria is a housewife and she has a small dressmaking workshop which has helped her to raise her family. She currently has high demand for dressmaking, so she needs to buy a larger sewing machine that would enable her to improve her products and increase her profits. She hopes to be successful, as she has been to date, with her dressmaking workshop.

loans.use: to buy a sewing machine.

loans.name: Julio

texts.es: Don julio es un padre de familia que quiere sacar adelante a su esposa y a sus hijos. El tiene un pequeño negocio de pulperia pero necesita comprar mas mercadería para poder generar mas ingresos. es por esto que necesita un préstamo de un millón cien mil colones para comprar nuevos productos y generar mas ventas. esto será de gran ayuda para crecer junto con su familia.
texts.en: Julio is a father who wants to get ahead with his wife and children.  He has a small convenience store but he needs to purchase more merchandise so that he can improve his earnings.  For this reason, he is seeking a loan to purchase new products and increase his sales.  This will greatly help him and his family to grow.

loans.use: purchase merchandise for his business.

loans.name: Coleen

texts.en:
Coleen is single and has a buy and sell scrap materials business in the Philippines.

She requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF to purchase more scrap materials to sell.

Coleen has been in this business for six years now.

In the future she would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase more scrap materials to sell

loans.name: Deogracia

texts.en:
Deogracia is 61 years old and married. She is a very hard working entrepreneur. 

Deogracia has a food vending business in the Philippines. Deogracia requested a PHP 17000 loan through NWTF, to purchase ingredients like rice, spices, vegetables, meat, fish, etc. for her business.

Deogracia has been in this business for 7 years. Deogracia would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to purchase ingredients like rice, spices, vegetables, meat, fish, etc. for her business

loans.name: Desideria

texts.en:
Desideria is a married woman with four children. She is a very hard working entrepreneur. Desideria is 48 years old and has three children who are currently in school.

Desideria has a general store business in the Philippines. She requested a PHP 29,000 loan amount through NWTF to buy additional stock to sell in her general store.

She successfully paid back her previous loan and is now requesting a new loan to further build her business.

Desideria has been in this business for eight years. In the future, she would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy additional stock to sell in her general store

loans.name: Carmen

texts.en:
Carmen is married and she works hard to support her family. She has a frozen foods business in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from farming sugarcane.  

Carmen is borrowing PHP 14,000 through NWTF to buy more stock of frozen foods to sell.

Carmen has been sustaining her business activities through her past six loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy more stock of frozen foods to sell.

loans.name: Lilia

texts.en:
Lilia is 58 years old and married with five children. Lilia works very hard to provide for them.

Lilia runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 30000 loan through NWTF, to buy inventory for her general store, items like beverages, canned goods, rice, home care products and other groceries.

Lilia has been in this business for 30 years.  Lilia would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy inventory for her general store, items like beverages, canned goods, rice, home care products and other groceries

loans.name: Yonah

texts.en:
Yonah is 45 years old and lives in Bundibugyo, Uganda. He trades in coffee and beans, mainly buying and selling. He earns additional income from cocoa gardens. He started the business in 2014 mainly to get income, although he is challenged by increasing transport costs and limited capital. He wants to expand and sell to more coffee agents in the future. 

Yonah has requested for a loan of 2,000,000 UGX to buy more coffee and beans for selling.

loans.use: To buy coffee and beans for selling.

loans.name: Kenzhebubu

texts.ru: Кенжебубу 53 года, замужем, мать 2 детей. У Кенжебубу средне-специальное образование, в качестве основного дохода почти всю свою жизнь занимается животноводством и полеводством. На сегодняшний день у нее есть 6 коров, 45 овец, также земельный надел мерою 2,80 ГА, где Кенжебубу выращивает картофель и люцерну. По хозяйству помогают ее дети. Кенжебубу обратилась в Банк «Бай-Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 30,000 сом (KGS) на покупку скота, для увеличения поголовь.
