Electricity is very important to do work in the home. His daughter does her homework in class. He would be grateful to be given the opportunity of this loan to buy these accessories.

loans.use: to buy accessories for a solar power system.

loans.name: Lourdes

texts.en:
Lourdes is 35 years old and married, and has seven children. Four of her children are in school.

Lourdes is in the agricultural poultry business in the Philippines. Lourdes requested a PHP 11,000 loan through NWTF to buy feeds and other supplies.

Lourdes has been in this business for one year now, and has borrowed three times in the past from NWTF to sustain her business.

In the future, Lourdes would like to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy feeds and other supplies

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy welding equipment for his shop.

loans.name: Asyl

texts.ru: Асыл 55 лет, замужем, 6 детей. На протяжении 35 лет Асыл занимается полеводством и животноводством. Благодаря упорному труду Асыл в ее хозяйстве на сегодняшний день имеется 5 коров и 75 овец. На участке мерою  3,0 Га она выращивает люцерну и ячмень. Ежемесячный доход Асыл составляет 10,000 сом (KGS). В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, Асыл обратилась в Банк «Бай –Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 50,000 сом (KGS) на покупку 2 жеребцов. Доходы от кредита она планирует вложить в дальнейшее увеличение поголовья скота, чтобы накопить средства на покупку сельскохозяйственной техники.
texts.en: Asyl is 55 years old, married and has 6 children. For the past 35 years, Asyl has practiced crop farming and livestock breeding, Thanks to Asyl's hard work, she currently has 5 cows and 75 sheep on her farm. On a 3.0 hectare plot of land she grows alfalfa and barley. Asyl's average monthly income is 10,000 som (KGS). For the further development of her business, Asyl turned to Microfinance Bank "Bai Tushum." She is requesting a loan for 50,000 som (KGS) to buy two colts. She plans to invest the earnings from the loan in the further acquisition of livestock so that she can save money to buy farm equipment.

loans.use: to buy two colts in order to increase the size of her herd.

loans.name: Olimpia

texts.es:
La socia Olimpia se dedica al negocio de venta de materiales de construccion, la socia vende cemento, arena y clavos, la socia trabaja desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 8:00 p.m,la socia ya tiene varios años en este negocio y le va muy bien, el sueño de la socia es ampliar el negocio de venta de materiales de construccion.La socia solicita el crédito para comprar cemento, clavos y arena.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Olimpia devotes herself to the business of selling construction materials. She sells cement, sand, and nails, and she works from 8:00 A.M. until 8:00 P.M.  She has been in this business for several years now, and it is going very well for her.  Her dream is to expand the construction materials sales business, and she is requesting a loan to purchase cement, nails, and sand.

She is happy about the loan, and she is committed to making her payments.

loans.use: to purchase cement, nails, and sand.

loans.name: Marietta

texts.en:
Marietta is 54 years old and married with seven children.

She earns a living by raising pigs in the Philippines. Marietta is borrowing 5,000 PHP through NWTF to buy feed and other supplies to raise her livestock. Marietta has been in this business for one year and also earns additional income from a general store.

She is working tirelessly toward the attainment of her dream: to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy feed and other supplies to raise her livestock

loans.name: Charlit

texts.en:
Charlit is 43 years old and married woman. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur. 

Charlit has a business manufacturing hollow blocks in the Philippines. Charlit requested a 20,000 PHP loan amount through NWTF in order to buy materials needed for making hollow blocks.

Charlit has been in this business for two years. In the future, Charlit would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy materials needed for making hollow blocks.

loans.name: Rodelen

texts.en:
Rodelen is a married woman with two children. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur. Rodelen is 26 years old and her two children are still in school.

Rodelen has a basket-weaving business in the Philippines. Rodelen requested a 10,000 PHP loan amount through NWTF to buy raw materials and other supplies for her business.

Rodelen has been in this business for 12 years. She would like to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy raw materials and other supplies for her basket-weaving business

loans.name: Reina

texts.en:
Reina is 34 years old and married with three children. With three children in school, Reina works very hard to provide for them.

Reina runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a 10,000 PHP loan through NWTF to buy items to sell such as canned goods, eggs, home product care and other groceries.

Reina has been in this business for seven years and sells a variety of items such as candies, soft drinks, biscuits, vinegar, canned goods, noodles, junk foods and other groceries. 

In the future, Reina would like to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy items to sell such as canned goods, eggs, home product care and other groceries

loans.name: Condrada

texts.en:
Condrada is a hardworking woman entrepreneur with six children.

She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a 12,000 PHP loan through NWTF to purchase additional stocks of groceries to sell. She industriously earns additional income through other business ventures like food vending and videoke rental businesses.

Condrada dreams that one day she will be able to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase additional stocks of groceries to sell

loans.name: Siony

texts.en:
Siony is 45 years old and married with eight children. She earns a living by raising pigs in the Philippines. Siony is borrowing PHP 13,000 through NWTF to buy feeds and other supplies to raise her livestock.

Siony has been in this business for 20 years and also earns additional income from a general store. She is working tirelessly toward the attainment of her dream: to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy feeds and other supplies to raise her livestock

loans.name: Lorna

texts.en:
Lorna is 47 years old, married and has two children.

Lorna is in the agricultural business in the Philippines. Lorna requested a PHP 25,000 loan through NWTF to purchase sacks of feed, vitamins and other supplies to raise her pigs.

Lorna has been in this business for 15 years now, and has borrowed 17 times in the past from NWTF to sustain her business.

She would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase sacks of feed, vitamins and other supplies to raise her pigs

loans.name: Vilma

texts.en:
Vilma is 46 years old and married with five children. One of her children is in school. Vilma works very hard to provide for her family.

Vilma runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 9,000 loan through NWTF to buy items to sell like beverages, junk food, home product care and other groceries.

Vilma has been in this business for ten years and sells a variety of items, such as canned goods, noodles, soap, soft drinks, biscuits, rice, milk and other groceries. 

In the future, Vilma would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy items to sell like beverages, junk food, home product care and other groceries
